nodes.Name: Library Management Social Network
nodes.Description: Library management social network is a graduation project and still developing. It is almost identical to GitHub with its page design and API design. Although I can't give much detail, it is a cool library management project for everyone that is almost finished. JavaScript, NodeJS, GraphQL, MongoDB, Mongoose, ReactJS, TypeScript, Docker, Primer.style

nodes.Name: Sekte AI Noise Reducer
nodes.Description: Convolutional Neural Networks machine learning model and desktop software for removing noise from noisy sounds. Works like krisp.ai. Python, TensorFlow, Keras, Numpy, Flask, C#.NET

nodes.Name: React Advanced News Ticker Component
nodes.Description: A powerful, flexible, lightweight and animated vertical news ticker component for React without dependencies. JavaScript, React

nodes.Name: Kodvizit Library Management Software
nodes.Description: Library management desktop software is actively used by hundreds of schools in Turkey. It has features like reading and printing barcodes, batch transfer and backup, advanced search, and many more. Continuing to be maintained since 2015. C#.Net, WinForms, SQLite, PHP, MySQL

nodes.Name: Giveaway Website
nodes.Description: Giveaway making website with thousands of monthly users. Giveaway results can be saved and shared with a short link. It allows making giveaways with different methods such as basic, wheel fortune, coin-toss, Instagram comments etc. JavaScript, React, GatsbyJS, PHP, MySQL

nodes.Name: Automatic Obis AI Captcha Solver
nodes.Description: AI browser extension for solving university’s login captchas. Uses neural networks machine learning model with computer vision. Python, OpenCV, TensorFlow, Heroku, C#.NET, JavaScript, Selenium

nodes.Name: Smartboard Lock
nodes.Description: Desktop software and Android app for preventing unauthorized use of smart boards in schools. USB, QR code, digits password, or pattern password are methods that can be used by the authorized users for login. Also, all smartboards and usage reports could be accessed over the network. Java, C#.Net, WinForms, PHP, MySQL

nodes.Name: Herbarium Manager
nodes.Description: Herbarium management system for universities and herbariums.

nodes.Name: University Community Manager Desktop and Web
nodes.Description: User management system for university communities. Authenticated users can list and search the members of communities. Also, they can give points to the members for attending events. C#.NET, PHP, JavaScript

nodes.Name: Blazor Time Picker
nodes.Description: Time picker component for blazor applications. C#, .NET Core, Blazor

nodes.Name: Giveaway Desktop
nodes.Description: It’s a programme that you can raffle about everything.

nodes.Name: QR Code Generator
nodes.Description: Simple QR code generating software for Windows. Users can choose the type of QR (URL, text, etc.). C#.NET

nodes.Name: After Format Script
nodes.Description: Bulk software installation after formating the computer.

nodes.Name: YBYB
nodes.Description: Print spooler service restarter. Also shared active directory computers with GPO.
